section.name: HST Configuration in web.xml
section.p: This example web.xml shows the installation of the hst.properties, of the 3 filters and a servlet for binaries.
section.source:
<!-- General configuration --> <context-param> <description>Comma separated list of configuration files.</description> <param-name>configurationFiles</param-name> <param-value>/WEB-INF/hst.properties</param-value> </context-param> <listener> <listener-class>org.hippoecm.hst.core.HSTConfiguration</listener-class> </listener>
<filter> <filter-name>ContextBaseFilter</filter-name> <filter-class>org.hippoecm.hst.core.template.URIFragmentContextBaseFilter</filter-class> <init-param> <param-name>levels</param-name> <param-value>1</param-value> </init-param> <init-param> <param-name>contentBase</param-name> <param-value>/</param-value> </init-param> <init-param> <param-name>ignorePaths</param-name> <param-value>/static,/binaries,/resources,/favicon.ico</param-value> </init-param> </filter>
<filter> <filter-name>TemplateContext</filter-name> <filter-class>org.hippoecm.hst.core.template.URLMappingTemplateContextFilter</filter-class> <init-param> <param-name>hstConfigurationUrl</param-name> <param-value>/hst:configuration/hst:configuration</param-value> </init-param> <init-param> <param-name>ignorePaths</param-name> <param-value>/static,/binaries,/resources,/favicon.ico</param-value> </init-param> </filter>
<filter> <filter-name>ModuleFilter</filter-name> <filter-class>org.hippoecm.hst.core.template.ModuleFilter</filter-class> <init-param> <param-name>ignorePaths</param-name> <param-value>/static,/binaries,/resources,/favicon.ico</param-value> </init-param> </filter>
<filter> <filter-name>ModuleFilter</filter-name> <filter-class>org.hippoecm.hst.core.template.ModuleFilter</filter-class> </filter>
<filter-mapping> <filter-name>previewContext</filter-name> <url-pattern>/preview/*</url-pattern> <dispatcher>REQUEST</dispatcher> </filter-mapping>
<filter-mapping> <filter-name>ModuleFilter</filter-name> <url-pattern>/*</url-pattern> <dispatcher>REQUEST</dispatcher> </filter-mapping>
<filter-mapping> <filter-name>TemplateContext</filter-name> <url-pattern>/*</url-pattern> <dispatcher>REQUEST</dispatcher> </filter-mapping>
<!-- Installation of a servlet serving binaries from repository. --> <servlet> <servlet-name>BinariesServlet</servlet-name> <servlet-class>org.hippoecm.hst.core.BinariesServlet</servlet-class> </servlet>
<servlet-mapping> <servlet-name>BinariesServlet</servlet-name> <url-pattern>/binaries/*</url-pattern> </servlet-mapping>
